Lyric:
[by:č ˘ć˘¨Sherry]
[00:09.89]Cop radio screaming
[00:12.11]Noise and tears
[00:14.32]Death on the TV
[00:16.66]And then there's you
[00:18.65]It's fucked, it's crazy
[00:20.57]I can't concentrate
[00:22.75]Just see your eye and...
[00:26.01]Back where we left off
[00:27.57]Watch you take your dress off
[00:29.68]I've been by myself remembering you
[00:34.38]Your body hurts me
[00:36.13]Loopin' 'round like CCTV
[00:39.92]In all this bitterness you stay so sweet
[00:43.56]It's such a cruel world
[00:46.29]Savin' all my love for you, girl
[00:50.62]It's such a cruel world
[00:55.10]Maybe I found somethin' good, girl
[01:00.20]

[01:06.49]A dead eyed actress girl
[01:08.94]And then there's you

[01:13.07]You put a spell on me

[01:17.44]For us
